module.name: advanced_boundary_representation
module.keywords: B-rep, B-spline surface, module, boundary representation
module.purpose:
This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the definition of a boundary representation solid with explicit topology and elementary or free-form geometry.
The second edition of this part of ISO 10303 incorporates the modifications to the first edition listed below.
The following ARM EXPRESS declarations and interface specifications have been added:
USE FROM Faceted_boundary_representation_arm;
USE FROM Topologically_bounded_surface_arm.
The following ARM EXPRESS declarations and interface specifications have been removed:
USE FROM Elemental_geometric_shape_arm.
In addition, modifications have been made to the mapping specification, the MIM schema and the EXPRESS-G diagrams to reflect and be consistent with the modifications of the ARM.
This third edition of this part of ISO 10303 incorporates the modifications to the second edition listed below.
The following ARM EXPRESS declarations and interface specifications have been added:
USE FROM Solid_model_arm;
advanced_brep_shape_representation_item;
Closed_shell;
Manifold_solid_brep;
Oriented_closed_shell;
collect_shells.
The following ARM EXPRESS declarations and interface specifications have been modified:
Advanced_brep_shape_representation.
The following ARM EXPRESS declarations and interface specifications have been removed:
USE FROM Faceted_boundary_representation_arm.
In addition, modifications have been made to the mapping specification, the MIM schema and the EXPRESS-G diagrams to reflect and be consistent with the modifications of the ARM.

inscope.li: use of topology to bound geometric entities;
items within the scope of application module Solid model, ISO/TS 10303-1793;
items within the scope of application module Topologically bounded surface, ISO/TS 10303-1511.

outscope.li: 2D geometry other than for the definition of a pcurve in the parameter space of a surface;
bounded curves other than polylines and B-spline curves;
bounded surfaces other than B-spline surfaces;

uof.name: Advanced_Boundary_Representation
uof.description: The Advanced_Boundary_Representation UoF specifies the definitional information for the concept of an advanced boundary representation model. An advanced B-rep model is a representation on one or more manifold_solid_breps each of which is defined with elementary geometry or sculptured geometry.
